[
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span(
            1,
            1,
        ),
    ),
    Expression {
        expression: Variable(
            BracedVariableVariable(
                BracedVariableVariable {
                    start: Span(
                        1,
                        7,
                    ),
                    variable: Literal(
                        String(
                            LiteralString {
                                value: "'foo'",
                                span: Span(
                                    1,
                                    9,
                                ),
                            },
                        ),
                    ),
                    end: Span(
                        1,
                        14,
                    ),
                },
            ),
        ),
        ending: Semicolon(
            Span(
                1,
                15,
            ),
        ),
    },
]
